English: An error occurred while processing the season information. Please try again.
Korean: 시즌 정보 처리에 오류가 발생했습니다. 다시 시도해주세요.

English: You've put bounty in previous season. You cannot place a bounty for two consecutive seasons.
Korean: 지난 시즌에 현상금을 걸었습니다. 2시즌 연속해서 참여할 수 없습니다.

English:
The amount of reward increases multiplied depending on the number of AP potion usage.
15% of the total bounty amount in operation is paid to users according to their contribution rate.
Korean:
보상은 AP포션 사용량에 따라 증가합니다.
전체 현상금의 15% NCG는 공헌도에 따라 분배됩니다.

English: We will reward one person with {0}, which is 5% of the total bounty!
You can receive a reward the first time you reach each floor in every season.
At the end of the season, you will be rewarded based on the amount of bounty you paid.
Korean: 시즌이 끝나면 제공한 현상금에 따라 보상을 받습니다.

English: 5% of the total bounty is paid to one person.
A new season of Adventure Boss has begun.
You can receive rewards by participating in bounties.
Korean: 현상금을 걸어서 운영에 참여하면 보상을 받을수 있습니다.

English: 5% of the total bounty is paid to one person.
The winner of the Adventure Boss has been decided.
The boss is determined when you place the first bounty.
The amount of reward changes depending on the amount of bounty.
Place the first bounty and recruit participants to defeat the Adventure Boss.
Korean: 최초의 현상금을 걸어 어드벤쳐 보스를 무찌를 참가자를 모집하세요.

English:
Unlocks floors {0} to {1}.
Unlock it with one of the two goods.
Korean:
{0} 층에서 {1}층 잠금 해제.
두가지중 1개의 재료를 사용하여 잠금 해제해보세요.

English:
Challenged floors that have not been cleared.
If you are defeated in battle, only the amount of AP potions used up to the point you cleared..
Korean:
도전한 층의 공략에 실패했습니다.
전투 도중에 패배하면, 클리어한곳까지만큼의 AP포션만 사용됩니다.

English: You must unlock the floor to play the challenge.
Korean: 도전를 통해 새로운 충을 클리어 할 수 있습니다.

English: There is no first clear reward when playing Breakthrough.
Korean: 돌파는 클리어 최초 보상을 받을수 없습니다.

English: You cannot open the adventure boss during battle.
Korean: 배틀 도중에는 어드벤쳐 보스를 오픈할 수 없습니다.

English: There is no first clear reward when playing Breakthrough.
Korean: 돌파는 클리어 최초 보상을 받을수 없습니다.

English: You need a higher staking level to participate in this adventure boss.
